channel.title: Community FAQ
channel.description:
Reply with your questions about the server here!
[b]What is Wurm Unlimited?[/b]
Wurm Unlimited is your full standalone version of the fantasy sandbox world Wurm Online, the MMORPG where the players are in charge! A pioneer in the ideas of player influence, crafting and adventure, it is now one of the most deep and feature packed sandbox experiences available.
[b]What does it cost?[/b]
27.99€ or your regional equivalent on Steam at http://store.steampowered.com/app/366220/
[b]Do you have an IRC Channel?[/b]
Yes! Server: irc.moparisthebest.xxx Port: 6697 (SSL enabled) Channel: #moparland
[b]What about modding?[/b]
I (Speljohan) am working on a mod framework to allow custom content to be introduced. It will be open source, and anyone is welcome to contribute. Well designed content will be added to our server.
For other questions to be included, just reply and i'll respond.

item.title: Community FAQ
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:2, topic:553631”]Does this count as the official moparscape server?[/quote]It does. Moparisthebest gave me permission to host an official server.

Read full topic
